description.narrative: This activity (LFSP Monitoring Reporting and Evaluation (2015 -2018)) is a component of Zimbabwe Livelihoods and Food Security Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,129,906. This component benefits Zimbabwe, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural development, Agricultural services. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development. The start date is 01-08-2013 and the end date is 31-07-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
